attributes.title: "Snipe Off" - BF3 vs MW3 Rap Battle
attributes.caption: Battlefield and CoD are bitter rivals yet they play so differently. So the question at the core is, which play style is better? We attempt to answer that question focusing on each game's sniping gameplay. Thank you to Brysi for his verses.
attributes.description: Battlefield and CoD are bitter rivals yet they play so differently. So the question at the core is, which play style is better? We attempt to answer that question focusing on each game's sniping gameplay. Thank you to Brysi for his verses.
attributes.display_title: "Snipe Off" - BF3 vs MW3 Rap Battle

attributes.title: The Next Console War (Xbox vs Playstation)
attributes.caption: The 8th generation of consoles started off with some juicy drama and we choose to highlight all that with this song. So Xbox or Playstation?
attributes.description: The 8th generation of consoles started off with some juicy drama and we choose to highlight all that with this song. So Xbox or Playstation?
attributes.display_title: The Next Console War (Xbox vs Playstation)

attributes.title: GTA V vs Saints Row 4 Rap Battle
attributes.caption: Which open world game is better between Saints Row and GTA? We try to sort that out through a rap battle. Thank you to Teamheadkick for their verses
attributes.description: Which open world game is better between Saints Row and GTA? We try to sort that out through a rap battle. Thank you to Teamheadkick for their verses
attributes.display_title: GTA V vs Saints Row 4 Rap Battle

attributes.title: Destiny vs Call of Duty Rap Battle
attributes.caption: Halo isn't the juggernaut it once was anymore and it's now Destiny that stands toe to toe with CoD. Thanks to Brysi for her verses.
attributes.description: Halo isn't the juggernaut it once was anymore and it's now Destiny that stands toe to toe with CoD. Thanks to Brysi for her verses.
attributes.display_title: Destiny vs Call of Duty Rap Battle

attributes.title: Terraria vs Minecraft Rap Battle
attributes.caption: For a while Minecraft had no real competition in the genre, but then here came this little game to challenge it. Naturally a rap battle ensues. Thank you to VGRB for their verses.
attributes.description: For a while Minecraft had no real competition in the genre, but then here came this little game to challenge it. Naturally a rap battle ensues. Thank you to VGRB for their verses.

attributes.title: Angry Birds vs Clash of Clans Rap Battle
attributes.caption: These two games aren't in the same genre, but for a while they were the kings of mobile gaming. This rap battle honors their app store domination.
attributes.description: These two games aren't in the same genre, but for a while they were the kings of mobile gaming. This rap battle honors their app store domination.

attributes.title: Slenderman vs Freddy Fazbear Rap Battle
attributes.caption: The two biggest names in indie horror games face off in a rap battle for the ages. Freddy Fazbear vs Slenderman, let's do this!
attributes.description: The two biggest names in indie horror games face off in a rap battle for the ages. Freddy Fazbear vs Slenderman, let's do this!
attributes.display_title: Slenderman vs Freddy Fazbear Rap Battle

attributes.title: Halo 5 vs CoD Black Ops 3 Rap Battle
attributes.caption: Black Ops 3 was so futuristic, we did a few double takes because it looked and felt so much like Halo. There has never been a better time to face these two games off. Thank you to VGRB for their verses.
attributes.description: Black Ops 3 was so futuristic, we did a few double takes because it looked and felt so much like Halo. There has never been a better time to face these two games off. Thank you to VGRB for their verses.
attributes.display_title: Halo 5 vs CoD Black Ops 3 Rap Battle

attributes.title: Lara Croft vs Nathan Drake Rap Battle
attributes.caption: Two treasure hunters and adventurers fight a battle of words in this epic rap battle between Lara Croft and Nathan Drake. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: Two treasure hunters and adventurers fight a battle of words in this epic rap battle between Lara Croft and Nathan Drake. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Tracer vs Scout Rap Battle
attributes.caption: The two most charasmatic characters from two wildly popular games created this dynamic thrill ride of a rap battle. So who do you think is faster? Tracer? Scout? Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: The two most charasmatic characters from two wildly popular games created this dynamic thrill ride of a rap battle. So who do you think is faster? Tracer? Scout? Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Doomguy vs Master Chief Rap Battle
attributes.caption: The original space marine vs. the most iconic space marine. Who would you rather have fighting on your side? Master Chief or Doomguy? Thank you to THK for their verses.
attributes.description: The original space marine vs. the most iconic space marine. Who would you rather have fighting on your side? Master Chief or Doomguy? Thank you to THK for their verses.

attributes.title: Mercy vs Medic Rap Battle
